pageTitle: House Appropriations Committee 110th Congress (2008 cycle): Member Money | OpenSecrets
textBeforeTable: See member profile] [ Totals by Sector to Robert B. Aderholt (R-Ala) Since legislative decisions made by this committee affect a broad range of industries and interest groups more or less equally, the charts offer a general, graphic take on which sectors gave. The contribution totals listed here refer to the total dollars received by that member from all industries. (For committees with jurisdictions focusing on specific industries, only those "committee-related" industries are listed in this section.) 110th Congress (2008 cycle) Earmarks Subcommittees Jurisdiction Top Industries Members Overview House Appropriations Committee Tweet Home / Politicians & Elections / Congressional Committees / Member Money Take Action Community Create Learn Resources Resources Newsletter Sign-up Campaign Finance Links Issue Profiles Center Press Releases OpenSecrets in the News Reports OpenSecrets Blog News & Analysis News & Analysis 527s Organizations PACs Revolving Door Lobbying
